DOC.detailed_description: 100 patient stable angina pectoris recruit HPS-THRIVE cohort cardiology outpatient department Fuwai Hospital Beijing . Patients attend department first thing morning two occasion , separate least 1 week . All subject fit 12-lead Holter monitor 24-hour ambulatory blood pressure monitor . They issue diary record activity symptom . Patients randomise wear simple facemask one visit ( 3M Dust Respirator 8812 ) . When randomised wear mask , subject ask wear mask much possible 24 hour prior study day 24 hour study day ( 48 hour total ) . Subjects instruct wear mask time outdoors , much possible indoors . On visit , patient ask walk along prespecified route 2 hour city centre location Beijing . During period patient walk pace 15 min rest 5 min total 120 min ( 6 cycle ) . After walk , subject return department pollution equipment switch . A formal BRUCE protocol exercise stress test perform soon possible finish 2-hour walk , blood test take prior exercise stress test ( 10-20mls total ) . Subjects ask wear ambulatory blood pressure monitor Holter ECG monitor total 24 hour , return follow day remove .
